Genji Monogatari: Based on the literary work of Shikibu Murasaki, Genji Monogatari is a story of the Emperor's second son born by a courtier. Made a commoner, he served as a retainer to the court.
[['Sugii, Gisaburou', 'Director'], ['Sadamoto, Yoshiyuki', 'Key Animation'], ['Maeda, Mahiro', 'Key Animation'], ['Nakura, Yasuhiro', 'Animation Director, Character Design']]
